thread.title_full: Global Computed Radiography and Digital Radiography Market 2015-2019

author: admin
title: Global Computed Radiography and Digital Radiography Market 2015-2019
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/3/2015 @ 3:12 PM   ReportLinker 
NEW YORK, Sept. 3, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- About computed radiography and digital radiographyComputed radiography and digital radiography are imaging techniques that use electromagnetic radiations, such as X-rays. Computed radiography is similar to conventional radiography; however, it uses imaging plates made of photostimulable phosphor instead of films. Computed radiography and digital radiography are preferred over conventional radiography because they require lesser processing time, do not require chemical processing, and are able to produce high-quality digital images.Technavio's analysts forecast the global computed radiography and digital radiography market to grow at a CAGR of 5.19% over the period 2014-2019. Covered in this report The report includes the present scenario and growth prospects of the global computed radiography and digital radiography market for the period 2015-2019. The market can be segmented into two: computed radiography and digital radiography.Technavio's report, Global Computed Radiography and Digital Radiography Market 2015-2019, has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from industry experts. The report covers the Americas, APAC, and EMEA; it also covers the landscape of the global computed radiography and digital radiography market and its growth prospects in the coming years. The report also includes a discussion on the key vendors operating in this market. Key regions
